summary: Indexed project structure for ZenGlow AI workspace (includes clarifying priority and hygiene tooling)

app.description: FastAPI application with RAG pipeline, audio transcription and TTS, metrics, diagnostics, and config endpoints.
main_modules: main.py (FastAPI entrypoint, mounts routers, static assets)
core/ (config, metrics, diagnostics, logging, redis cache, secrets)

components: embedder.py / embeddings.py (embedding generation and model abstraction)
llm_client.py (multi-backend LLM selection: Supabase Edge, llama.cpp server, Ollama, dev fake)
ranking_router.py (HTTP interface for RAG scoring endpoints)

frontend.dashboard: Vite + React app with pages Dashboard and GemmaPhi (chat UI).

docker.note: docker-compose currently not runnable (docker-compose not installed).

supporting.scripts/: Utility scripts (finetuning, memory rag bridge, current affairs, hygiene check, clarify priority dataset builder).
supporting.docs/: Architecture and integration documentation (RAG, memory, retrieval). See DOCS_INDEX.md for navigation. Root hygiene audit tracked in docs/ROOT_HYGIENE_AUDIT.md.
supporting.infrastructure/schemas/: Service / vector DB schema definitions (e.g., hybrid_schema.json) relocated from root for hygiene.
supporting.tests/: Pytest suite (includes clarifying priority feature tests).
supporting.clarify_priority: Files: scripts/build_clarify_priority_dataset.py, app/rag/clarify_priority_features.py (feature extraction), heuristic priority integrated in scripts/rag_ingest.py
